biocontainers.name: transtermhp
biocontainers.summary: Find rho-independent transcription terminators in bacterial genomes

biotools.summary: TransTermHP finds rho-independent transcription terminators in bacterial genomes. Each terminator found by the program is assigned a confidence value that estimates its probability of being a true terminator

bioschemas.name: TransTermHP
bioschemas.summary: TransTermHP finds rho-independent transcription terminators in bacterial genomes. Each terminator found by the program is assigned a confidence value that estimates its probability of being a true terminator

galaxy.summary: Finds rho-independent transcription terminators in bacterial genomes
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: TransTermHP finds rho-independent transcription terminators in bacterial genomes. Each terminator found by the program is assigned a confidence value that estimates its probability of being a true terminator
